meanings.sent1: The unpledged gift was a surprise.
meanings.sent2: She found an unpledged book on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The unpledged cookie mysteriously appeared on the table.
meanings.sent4: His unpledged loyalty was like a free bird.
meanings.sent5: The unpledged sky was vast and open.

meanings.definition: Not bound by a pledge or promise
meanings.sent1: The unpledged student had not made any commitments.
meanings.sent2: He felt unpledged to any specific group.
meanings.sent3: The unpledged puppy ran around freely in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her unpledged heart was like a wandering cloud.
meanings.sent5: The unpledged road stretched out endlessly before them.

meanings.definition: Not committed to a particular course of action
meanings.sent1: The unpledged voter had not decided yet.
meanings.sent2: She remained unpledged to any political party.
meanings.sent3: The unpledged decision hung in the air, undecided.
meanings.sent4: His unpledged mind was like a blank canvas.
meanings.sent5: The unpledged forest was full of endless possibilities.
